titleStmt.title: The English princess, or, The death of Richard the III a tragedy written in the year 1666, and acted at His Highness the Duke of York's Theatre.
titleStmt.author: Caryll, John, 1625-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Dring, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Caryll. Cf. BM.
